cleaned_text: Beware Of The Adverse Effects Of Trans Fats On Your Heart](https://www.thehealthsite.com/diseases-conditions/heart-disease/samosas-french-fries-chips-beware-of-the-adverse-effects-of-trans-fats-on-your-heart-1007746/) Senior Cardiologist Dr. Tilak Suvarna warns you to steer clear of these five prevalent trans fat-laden foods to reduce your risk of heart disease.
